name: Apple IIGS Disk Image
summary: Learn about .2MG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: 2MG files are also recognized by various Apple IIGS emulators, allowing them to be opened on newer Macs, as well as Windows and Unix systems.

description: Disk image created from a floppy disk formatted for the Apple IIGS, a 16-bit Apple II computer; may contain applications, games, or other files that can be used by an Apple IIGS system.
